doc.title: Dead to the Last Drop
doc.plot: Three bloodthirsty Vampire tales that you can really sink your teeth into. The place: Retro City, home of the tough guys. First, in the "Omega Wrestler", the Mod Mutilator is enjoying a relaxing evening at home when a group of angry vampires surround his house. Big mistake... for them! Next, Occult investigator, Harry Gross must get Dracula's ring back from a sleazy french vampire who has plans to take over the USA in " The Vampire Pierre". Last, but never least, secret agent Rex Jones must stop a Nazi - Arab - Vampire terrorist plot in " Bloodsucking Sheiks".
